mapper.select: select * from QDServerInfo t where tenant_maxcount>tenant_curcount order by tenant_curcount

select id,tenant_Account as tenantAccount,tenantPassword,serverIp,servertPort as serverPort,dbName,db_Account as dbAccount,dbPassword,companyName,phoneNo from QDTenantInfo t where companyName= #{companyName}

select id,tenant_Account as tenantAccount,tenantPassword,serverIp,servertPort as serverPort,dbName,db_Account as dbAccount,dbPassword,companyName,phoneNo from QDTenantInfo t where tenant_Account= #{tenantAccount} and tenantPassword = #{tenantPassword}
select id,tenant_Account as tenantAccount,tenantPassword,serverIp,servertPort as serverPort,dbName,db_Account as dbAccount,dbPassword,companyName,phoneNo from QDTenantInfo t
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QDTenantInfo ( tenant_Account, tenantPassword, serverIp, servertPort, dbName, db_Account, dbPassword, companyName, phoneNo) VALUES ( #{tenantAccount}, #{tenantPassword}, #{serverIp}, #{serverPort}, #{dbName}, #{dbAccount}, #{dbPassword}, #{companyName}, #{phoneNo} )
